title: Complete Unknown Lag
body:
Ever since about patch 6.18 I have been experiencing lag that i can't seem to figure out.
My ping stays the same (58) and my fps is normal.
I seem to dc when I'm near enemy champs more than not..?
When I dc i just stop moving and will walk in the last clicked position for about 3-4 seconds until I can control my champion gin, usually after i'm dead..
On other occasions during the game it actually tells me "Unable to reconnect" for for 10~ seconds or I restart my client.
This is inconvenient and if there is any ideas I'd appreciate it.

{{item:3151}}

replies.body: It sounds like your network is having troubel maintaining a connection or at least communicating what's happening in the match.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) for an overview of what's going on in these games.  The results will also give you some troubleshooting steps specific to what's happening for you.  Let me know if you have any questions!

Hello, sounds like packet loss. Can you try these tutorials:
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq6

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader

In addition, are you a Windows 10 user who got a recent W10 Anniversary update? Please have a look at these threads:
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/X6sPFPu8-fps-drops-and-crashes-after-the-windows-10-anniversary-update
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/KFxcVtYK-my-computer-is-randomly-freeezing-mid-game?comment=0000 
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/il5Qxm2w-if-you-are-still-having-the-bugsplat-bug-after-champ-select-read-this
http://www.laptopmag.com/articles/set-compatibility-mode-windows-10
